name: Conservation International Europe
membership: Conservation International is member of the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN), the Climate Action Network (CAN International) and holds the Secretariat of the Critical Ecosystem Partnership Fund (CEPF).
goal: Conservation International is an organisation with global reach and impact. Building upon a strong foundation of science, partnership and field demonstration, CI empowers societies to responsibly and sustainably care for nature for the well-being of humanity. CI works in more than 40 countries on four continents. CI Europe is the organisation’s office in charge of policy work at EU level. Based in Brussels, it has a status of Belgian ASBL and started its operations in February 2010.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
- Climate policies
- Biodiversity policies
- EU development aid
- EU Budget
- Biofuels
- EU Outermost Regions and Overseas Countries and Territories
